meanings.definition: Having or consisting of a gallery.
meanings.sent1: The galleried room had beautiful paintings displayed along the walls.
meanings.sent2: The house had a galleried porch where we could sit and enjoy the view.
meanings.sent3: The galleried hallway made it feel like we were walking through an art museum.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes scanned the galleried walls, taking in every detail of the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The galleried balcony provided a stunning vantage point of the city skyline.

meanings.sent1: The galleried living room was adorned with family photos and souvenirs.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant was galleried, with tables on both levels for diners to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The galleried bedroom felt cozy and intimate with its unique layout.
meanings.sent4: The galleried office space gave employees a sense of privacy and space.
meanings.sent5: The galleried kitchen had shelves filled with colorful cookware and utensils.

meanings.definition: Open to or overlooking a gallery.
meanings.sent1: The galleried balcony offered a stunning view of the garden below.
meanings.sent2: The hotel room was galleried, allowing guests to see the lobby below.
meanings.sent3: The galleried window provided a picturesque view of the countryside.
meanings.sent4: The galleried veranda was the perfect spot to watch the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The galleried terrace overlooked the bustling city streets.
